Sniper leaves the Cr chamber and heads to a window of the ark. He 
pulls out his Rifle and aims at Oblitron's Chest and fires 3 times.
He 
says to himself, "I have return to battle during the time when my 
besst freind think of me as a prisoner, I, Sniper, Shall Defeat The 
Predacon Empire, because where there is a child-bot crying in the 
night, I shall be there. Where the is HAHAHAHA, how stupid am I?"
